topic.title: Precondition For Substance Administration - conformance rules

ol.li: This criterion SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:7367) (CONF:7367)
This criterion MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7373). (CONF:7373)
This criterion SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:7369). (CONF:7369)
Contains exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Criterion
This criterion SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:7367) (CONF:7367)
This criterion MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7373). (CONF:7373)
This criterion SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:7369). (CONF:7369)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <precondition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25"/> <criterion/> </precondition>
